text:

An urban farm turned unused rooftops into vegetable patches. Volunteers learned soil care and irrigation, and nearby schools used the site for hands-on lessons about food systems.

explanation: Answer follows directly from the passage.

options_json: ["Reveal a secret","In brief","Face a difficult situation","Avoid the main topic"]

text: Meaning of the idiom: “Bite the bullet”
options_json: ["Face a difficult situation","Reveal a secret","Stop working on something","Undecided"]
explanation: “Bite the bullet” means “Face a difficult situation”.

text:

B. Students designed posters.
C. Bins were placed across campus.
D. Waste reduced within weeks.

A. The workshop began with a quick warm-up.

C. Mentors guided the brainstorming.

options_json: ["Some poets may be teachers.","All dreamers are poets.","No teacher is a poet.","Some teachers are not dreamers."]

text:
